page.title: 02Waitrose
page.content: Waitrose opened in September 1982 and stocks 10,260 items. The first Waitrose was set up by two men called Mr.Wait and Mr.Rose,early on in the 1920's,then it was just one supermarket,now it is on of the top supearket networks in England. Waitrose, which covers 1.5 acres,has deliveries almost every day,which are put on the shelves by the 200 staff and then sold.On average Waitrose sells 150,000 items per week,which are bought by the 9-10 thousand customers that shop there. Waitrose has a store detective who roams around the shop and stops most of the shoplifting.Waitrose has a lot of people buying things,some people only spend 50p,others will spend up to 350 pounds,which makes the daily intake 140,000 pounds.
